SubtaskDescription: Define the end-to-end workflow for processing PDFs, including text extraction, image description, image generation, and document creation.
Create a new module in `ferri-core` for the PDF processing workflow.
Implement the main function in the new module that orchestrates the entire workflow.
Add unit tests for the workflow orchestrator.
Add a dependency for PDF parsing (e.g., `pdf-extract`).
Implement a function to extract text from a PDF file.
Implement a function to extract images from a PDF file.
Implement a function to generate a text description of an image (e.g., using a pre-trained model).
Add unit tests for text and image extraction.
Add a dependency for image generation (e.g., `image`).
Implement a function to generate an image from a text description.
Add unit tests for image generation.
Add a dependency for document creation (e.g., `docx-rs`).
Implement a function to create a new document with text and images.
Add unit tests for document generation.
Implement the logic to pass the extracted text and image descriptions to the document generation function.
Implement the logic to pass the image descriptions to the image generation function.
Implement the logic to insert the generated images into the new document.
Add unit tests for the workflow orchestration.
In `ferri-cli`, define a new `pdf` command with a `process` subcommand.
In `ferri-cli`, add arguments to the `process` subcommand for the input PDF file and the output document file.
In `ferri-cli`, call the main workflow function from the `pdf process` match arm.
In `ferri-cli/tests/`, write an integration test for the `pdf process` command.
Create the basic directory structure: prompts/, scripts/, and output/.
Initialize a Git repository for the project.
Create a README.md file with a project description and setup instructions.
Implement the main ferri executable to orchestrate the workflow.
Implement the 'do' command to accept a high-level user directive.
Implement the 'run' command to execute local Python scripts.
Implement the 'with' command to interact with the Gemini API.
Create the get_transcript.py script to fetch YouTube video transcripts.
Implement error handling in get_transcript.py for invalid URLs or videos without transcripts.
Create the prompts/video_debrief.txt prompt template.
Implement logic to dynamically assemble the prompt with the fetched transcript.
Integrate the Gemini API client into the 'with' command.
Implement the logic to pass the assembled prompt to the Gemini 1.5 Pro model.
Implement parsing and validation for the JSON output from the Gemini API.
Create the draw_overlay.py script to draw SVG contours on images.
Create the generate_report.py script to synthesize the final Markdown debrief.
Implement logic to save the key moment screenshots from the Base64-encoded strings in the JSON output.
Define the workflow as a DAG, inspired by aorta_dag.csv.
Implement a DAG runner within the ferri core to execute the workflow nodes in the correct order.
Implement error handling and logging for the DAG execution.
